abstract: Sheila C. Bair told a Senate committee that regulators needed the means to put the financial overhaul bill into effect.
snippet: Sheila C. Bair told a Senate committee that regulators needed the means to put the financial overhaul bill into effect.
lead_paragraph: Federal lawmakers could harm the financial system by failing to give regulators the money and power to put the Dodd-Frank Act into effect, Sheila C. Bair, the chairman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, told lawmakers at a hearing on Thursday in Washington.

headline.main: A Warning on Dodd-Frank From F.D.I.C. Chief in Her Final Senate Hearing
headline.print_headline: A Warning on Dodd-Frank From F.D.I.C. Chief in Her Final Senate Hearing

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
